attributes.additional_details: The money belongs the British people and should only be spent on improving the lives of British people
attributes.background: The money that is generated through all the taxes does not belong any British government it belongs to the people of the country. While the country owes trillions in debt. NO MONEY SHOULD BE GIVEN TO ANY COUNTRY OR ORGANISATIONS OVERSEAS!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700263
